results:
A list of most-used 39 memorable mean girls quotes

	
	Are you finding popular mean girls quotes? Enjoy the greatest quotes from this famous film. we collect best gifs from mean girls quotes; don't forget share them in everywhere if you like them.

	mean girls movie,Mean Girls is a 2004 American teen comedy film directed by Mark Waters.Director: Mark Waters,Stars: Lindsay Lohan, Jonathan Bennett, Rachel McAdams

	

	It's not my fault you're like,in love with me,or something!

	 

	

	You may think you like someone, but you could be wrong.

	 

	

	On October 3rd, he asked me what day it was.

	 

	

	Mom, can you pick me up? I'm scared.

	 

	

	And on the third day, God created the Remington bolt-action rifle so that Man could fight the dinosaurs…and the homosexuals.

	 

	

	Your hair looks sexy pushed back.

	 

	

	Don't have sex, 'cause you will get pregnant…and die.

	 

	

	Oh my God, Danny Devito! I love your work!

	 

	

	Whatever, I'm getting cheese fires.

	 

	

	Janis, I cannot stop this car, I have a curfew.

	 

	

	The limit does not exist.

	 

	

	so fetch!

	 

	

	And I'd be like, "Why are you so obsessed with me?"

	 

	

	In Girl WOrld,Halloween is the one night a year when girls can dress like a total slut and no other girls can say anything about it.

	 

	

	I'm kind of psychic. I have a fifth sense.

	 

	

	It's Halloween!

	 

	

	Janis: Did you have an awesome time? Did you drink awesome shooters, listen to awesome music, and then just sit around and soak up each others awesomeness?

	 

	

	Damn, you are SO lucky you have us to guide you!

	 

	

	-Nice wig,Janis. What's it made of?
	-Your Mom's chest hair!

	 

	

	There are two kinds of evil people in this world. Those who do evil stuff and those who see evil stuff being done and don't try to stop it

	 

	

	I like you.

	Go away!

	 

	

	Shut up.

	 

	

	How many of you have ever felt personally victimized by Regina George?

	 

	

	Get in, loser. We're going shopping.

	 

	

	And right now you're getting on my last nerve.

	 

	

	And none for Gretchen Wieners,bye.

	 

	

	You can't sit with us!

	 

	

	You know swedish?

	 

	 

	

	Love ya.

	 

	 

	

	Because being with the plastics was like being famous.

	 

	

	So if you're from Africa, why are you white?

	 

	

	Stupid girls make up rumours because they're bored with their on lives.

	 

	

	You are a mean girl! YOu're a bitch!

	 

	

	I don't wanna be punished for being well-liked.

	 

	

	Calling somebody else fat won't make you any skinnier. Calling someone stupid doesn't make you any smarter.

	 

	

	I just have a lot of feelings.

	 

	

	I'm not like a regular mom. I'm a cool mom.

	 

	

	Hell,no. I did "not" leave the South Side for this!

	 

	

	But you all have got to stop calling each other sluts and whores. It just makes it okay for guys to call you sluts and whores.
